<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the vehicle an unit is assigned to. If no vehicle is assigned [[objNull]] is returned.
<br><br>
Notes:
* The assignment happens via the various assignAsXXX/moveInXXX commands, or player/AI GL getIn radio commands, getIn waypoint, or when units start in vehicles or get moved in to a vehicle by Zeus/via Eden.
* [[addVehicle]] indirectly may also add the vehicle, however only if an AI GL assigns [[assignedVehicleRole|vehicle roles]] (which depends on various things).
* [[vehicle]] returns the current vehicles an AI is in, while with [[assignedVehicle]] the AI may not (yet) be in the said vehicle (still in transit or held of by waypoints or other SQF commands).
* To make AI under AI GL enter a vehicle, use [[orderGetIn]] [[true]].
* While [[unassignVehicle]] works, if the group is under AI command, the AI GL may re-assign the vehicle immediately. To stop the AI from re-entering at least, use [[orderGetIn]] or [[allowGetIn]] [[false]], or permanently remove the assignment vi a [[leaveVehicle]].
* For player GL lead AI [[assignedVehicle]] seems not to be really reliable/behaves strange. Disembark radio command seems to [[unassignVehicle|unassign]] though.
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[assignedVehicle]] unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_vehicle = [[assignedVehicle]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
		  
</value></part><part><name>x12</name>=<value> <code>_units [[apply]] {[[Magic Variables|_x]] [[leaveVehicle]] (assignedVehicle [[Magic Variables|_x]])};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[addVehicle]], [[assignAsDriver]], [[assignAsCargo]], [[assignAsCommander]], [[assignAsGunner]], [[unassignVehicle]], [[leaveVehicle]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
